name: CodePushReleaseCordova
description: Release an update to a CodePush Cordova app deployment
author: Microsoft Corporation
instanceNameFormat: Prepare and release cordova update to $(deploymentName) ($(appName))

inputs.name: accessKey
inputs.label: Access Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Access key used to authenticate with the CodePush service.

inputs.name: serviceEndpointCodePush
inputs.label: Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: CodePush service endpoint that is configured with your account credentials.

inputs.name: serviceEndpointHockeyApp
inputs.label: Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: HockeyApp service endpoint that is configured with your account credentials.

inputs.name: appName
inputs.label: App Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the app you want to release the update for.

inputs.name: deploymentName
inputs.label: Deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the deployment you want to release the update to.

inputs.name: platform
inputs.label: Platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Platform to build/prepare the release for.

inputs.name: shouldBuild
inputs.label: Build?
inputs.helpMarkDown: This task runs cordova prepare to set up assets by default. Checking this box will tell it to do a cordova build instead of a cordova prepare. Use this if you have a build hook that sets up assets.

inputs.name: appStoreVersion
inputs.label: Target Binary Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Semver expression that specifies the binary app version(s) this release is targetting (e.g. 1.1.0, ~1.2.3). Default will autodetect from config.xml.

inputs.name: rollout
inputs.label: Rollout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Percentage of users this release should be immediately available to.

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Description of the changes made to the app in this release.
Note: This can be set to **$(Release.ReleaseDescription)** if being run within a release definition, and you want to inherit the release's description.

inputs.name: isMandatory
inputs.label: Mandatory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether this release should be considered mandatory.

inputs.name: isDisabled
inputs.label: Disabled
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether this release should be immediately downloadable.
